entity_at_position.helper: This trigger will be triggered when a custom entity is at position
entity_at_position.position_change_helper:
Write 'current' in position_tag for get current node,mappin, fasttravel, custom_place or custom_room. 
 For poi if you write 'current' in position_poi_district you will get the current district, 
 if you write 'current in position_poi_subdistrict you will get the current subdistrict. 
 also if you write 'random' in position_poi_subdistrict or position_poi_district, you will get an 'random' value
entity_at_position.name: entity_at_position

custom_place_type.helperTitle: House : in specific Custom Place Type

custom_place_type.name: custom_place_type

game_language.helper:
This trigger will be triggered when game language is same than value. Can be : 
 de-de,
 en-us,
 fr-fr,
 pl-pl,
 es-es,
 es-mx,
 it-it,
 kr-kr,
 zh-cn,
 zh-tw,
 ru-ru,
 jp-jp,
 ar-ar,
 cz-cz,
 hu-hu,
 tr-tr,
 pt-br
game_language.name: game_language
